Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Amberton Lane, north of the Grape Orchards.
Room.LongDescription: The Chateau Richland Grape Orchards lie to the south of Hillcrest Drive, located to the south of here. The large grape orchard supplies nearly all of the grapes used in making the Chateau Richland Wines and other natural drinks. Chateau Richland is well known throughout the land as being one of the finest producers of wine in the world.
